alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Fulton; Logan; Macon; Mason; McLean; Menard; Peoria; Piatt; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Menard, Logan, southeastern Woodford, eastern Fulton, northeastern Sangamon, northern Piatt, De Witt, Tazewell, McLean, northeastern Mason, south central Peoria and northern Macon Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from near Pekin to Elkhart to Bloomington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Other locations in the path of this storm include Heyworth. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 0 and 31. Interstate 39 between mile markers 0 and 19. Interstate 474 between mile markers 13 and 14. Interstate 55 between mile markers 111 and 187. Interstate 72 between mile markers 151 and 172. Interstate 74 between mile markers 99 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: De Witt; Fulton; Logan; Macon; Mason; McLean; Menard; Peoria; Piatt; Tazewell; Woodford
